Nion M. Dransfeld

Civil Engineer | Data Scientist | Machine Learning Engineer

I am a data specialist with experience in deploying applications using Docker, Streamlit and Shiny.This site presents my projects and also offers educational content on geosciences, statistics, data science, programming, and machine learning.

Insights

Data science is not about making complicated models. It's about making it simple enough to understand the problem at hand and then robustly solving it.

– Dr. N.R. Srinivasa Raghavan

Overfitting is more dangerous than failing to build the most powerful model possible.

– Pedro Domingos
